job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering responsibilities focused on building and maintaining the infrastructure and systems that support AI models, emphasizing scalability and reliability, which aligns with traditional software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and management of distinct software services and databases, which are fundamental software engineering tasks, rather than tasks directly related to AI model development or data preparation for training.

job_tasks.phrase: provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building software functionality (quality assurance) that interacts with and controls generative AI models. The focus is on developing the system's control mechanisms, which falls under software integration and development.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of integrating an AI platform into a broader product suite, which is a core software development and integration responsibility.

profile.rationale: The job description exclusively details tasks related to core software engineering (scalability, reliability, services, databases, integration) that support or integrate with AI/LLM infrastructure. There are no tasks mentioned that involve developing, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or specific data preparation for AI models. The role is focused on building and maintaining the software systems that utilize AI, rather than the AI models themselves.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities being centered on back-end software engineering, system integration, scalability, and reliability within the context of supporting AI/LLM infrastructure. The role's focus is unambiguously on the engineering of the surrounding systems.
